issue.title: Need to parse and use the scene message

content.raw:
Yes, In my test the agents after sending the scene message have waited to receive back the sense message from the simulator. I uploaded a aversion in which after Sence message the simulator sends  back a time message to the agent , by using that the presented issue has been solved. I did not changed the initialization policy and the agent is initialized by Init message. I think multiple agents can now be run on the simulator.
I also commented some parts in GameStae.cc related to the dependency of the beaming and initializing to the play_mode.
